entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
